item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Likan Zhan Add: 15, Xueyuan Rd., Haidian District, Beijing 100083, China Tel: +86 10 8230 3468 Email: zhanlikan AT hotmail DOT com Personal website: https://likan.info Academic appointment 2014.10 ~ Now, Assistant professor, MEG Laboratory for Brain Sciences, Institute for Speech Pathology and the Brain Science, Beijing Language and Culture University, Beijing, China Education 2010.10 ~ 2014.09, Ph.D. Cognitive Science, Macquarie University, Sydney, Australia
